content.rendered:
Highlights

  • Entry valid till 14 Nov 2024
  • Valid on a minimum 5000 INR Billing on a single tattoo (18% GST Extra)
  • You must show the voucher code in your email before getting services.
  • The voucher will not be valid if you show it after getting services.
  • 3 Winners will be announced on Dev Diwali – 15th Nov 2024.

T&C

  1. Prior appointment is required
  2. One voucher is valid for one person, one tattoo & on a single visit
  3. This gift voucher cannot be clubbed/redeemed with any other promotional offer at Black Poison Tattoos
  4. Black Poison Tattoos reserves all rights to amend rules
  5. Rates differ as per the customization and the artists
  6. Discount rates depend on Tattoo Design, Artist, Size, Timing and body Placement.
  7. No verbal commitments are accepted in case of dispute, outlet management’s decision will be final.
  8. For further information about the offers, visit our studio or call us.
  9. This offer is only valid for tattoos created during the promotion period 1 Nov 2024 to 14 Nov 2024
  10. Three winners will be randomly selected from all eligible entries.
  11. We can increase or decrease lucky winners as per the number of received entries at the end of the last date.
  12. Black Poison Tattoos ensures the selection process is fair and unbiased. No participant will be given an advantage, and the drawing process will be documented for transparency.
  13. Prizes are non-transferable and cannot be exchanged for cash or alternative items.
  14. If a winner does not respond within 7 days of being contacted, they forfeit their prize, and an alternate winner may be chosen.
  15. By entering, participants consent to the use of their name, photo, and/or tattoo for marketing and promotional purposes without additional compensation.
  16. This promotion is in no way sponsored, endorsed, or administered by, or associated with, GOPRO or any other third parties.
  17. Black Poison Tattoos reserves the right to change or cancel the giveaway at any time.
  18. By participating in this giveaway, entrants agree to abide by these Terms & Conditions.

excerpt.rendered:
🔥 Diwali Tattoo Giveaway 🔥

Ink your story with us this Diwali & stand a chance to WIN a GOPRO Camera!

  • Spend ₹5000 or more on a single tattoo
  • Automatically enter the giveaway
    🎁 3 Lucky Winners will take home a GOPRO Camera!
    🗓 Winners will be announced on Nov 15, 2024

Celebrate Diwali with style and a dash of adventure! 🌟✨
